CustomField.description: The amount of the last (partial soft-credit) gift from this Account. See "Combined Last Gift Amount" for largest gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount of the last (partial soft-credit) gift from this Account. See "Combined Last Gift Amount" for largest gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Last Partial Soft Credit Gift Amount
